# Specific test functions


## Load the koboLoops Package

```{r, results='hide', message=FALSE,warning=FALSE,error=FALSE}
library("visualisationIMPACT")
```

## Example data frame
Here we are downloading from a file in test repository. 


```{r}
data<-load_data("../tests/testthat/testdata.csv")

```

## Barchart with average (numerical-categorical)

### Calculate average, min and max
```{r,eval=F}

dependent.var = "hhnumberindividuals"
independent.var = "region" 

result <- data %>% select(c( independent.var , dependent.var)) %>% group_by_(independent.var) %>% summarise_all(c(average=mean,min=min,max=max))

```


### Print barchart


```{r,eval=F}
barchart_average(result, region, average, min, max)

```
